com.google.android.drdat.cl.DrdatTask

DrdatTask Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Content provider that returns the forms for a specific task.

The query(...) method is the only method that really does anything in this interface.

Author:
cal

Override Cursor query ( Uri  uri,
String[]  projection,
String  selection,
String[]  selectionArgs,
String  sortOrder 
)

Grabs the study and task information for a given participant / task.

Needs the email, passwordMD5, study_id and task_id in the selectionArgs in order to find or generate the form data for that task.

See also:
android.content.ContentProvider.query(android.net.Uri, java.lang.String[], java.lang.String, java.lang.String[], java.lang.String)
Parameters:
uri - uri we were called with
projection - fields we want (not used)
selection - sql where clause (not used)
selectionArgs - contains the study_id, task_id, email, passwordMD5 we want
sortOrder - order by clause (not used)
Returns:
cursor with the form data for this task
